Description: The following statement contains a magic number: for (int i = 1; i <= 9; i++)              {                  sheet1.CreateRow(0).CreateCell(i).SetCellValue(i);              }
The following statement contains a magic number: for (int i = 1; i <= 9; i++)              {                  sheet1.CreateRow(i).CreateCell(0).SetCellValue(i);              }

The following statement contains a magic number: for (int iRow = 1; iRow <= 9; iRow++)              {                  IRow row = sheet1.GetRow(iRow);                  for (int iCol = 1; iCol <= 9; iCol++)                  {                      //the first cell of each row * the first cell of each column                      string formula = GetCellPosition(iRow' 0) + "*" + GetCellPosition(0' iCol);                      row.CreateCell(iCol).CellFormula = formula;                  }              }

The following statement contains a magic number: for (int iRow = 1; iRow <= 9; iRow++)              {                  IRow row = sheet1.GetRow(iRow);                  for (int iCol = 1; iCol <= 9; iCol++)                  {                      //the first cell of each row * the first cell of each column                      string formula = GetCellPosition(iRow' 0) + "*" + GetCellPosition(0' iCol);                      row.CreateCell(iCol).CellFormula = formula;                  }              }
